attributes.action: Government to Support with technical and Financial assistance foreign nationals who are settled but could benefit from voluntary repatriation
attributes.additional_details:
The project aims to assist foreign nationals of working age who have residency and settlement rights in the United Kingdom but are not in employment and are dependent on the state to have the alternative to return to their countries of origin to settle with the support of financial and technical assistance to support them through with reintegration in their home countries.
The project aims to mobilise support to encourage foreign nationals of working age in the United Kingdom who are not in employment and are dependent on the state to accept a one off  voluntary repatriation package and ongoing technical assistance to assist them settle in their countries of origin after several years of absence and limited economic creativity.
